definitions.definition: a flat, usually square, piece of baked clay, carpet or other material that is used in rows for covering walls and floors
a piece of baked clay that is used in rows for covering roofs

examples.text: We lost a few tiles in the storm.

definitions.definition: any of the small flat pieces that are used in particular board games
to stay out late enjoying yourself

wordOrigin: Old English tigele, from Latin tegula, from an Indo-European root meaning ‘cover’.
